aboutMe.description: I'm Simon Shen, a passionate Front-End & Full-Stack Developer with expertise in Angular, .NET Core, and modern web development.
aboutMe.additionalInfo: I enjoy creating modern, user-friendly websites and applications. Let's collaborate to build something amazing!

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer and Information Science

education.institution: Nanfang College of Sun Yat-Sen University

experiences.title: Software Engineer
duties: Led development of a high-performance SPA (Angular, .NET Core), achieving 80% faster through front-end code refactoring.
Upgraded Angular from v7 to v16, added new features, and ensured security compliance with OneNZ.
Expanded backend capabilities, driving full-stack proficiency.

experiences.title: Web Developer
duties: Built customer websites with WordPress, Duda, and Wix.
Collaborated with designers for user-friendly designs.

projects.title: IoT platform
projects.description: An IoT platform providing efficient technical support and customized solutions for dozens of clients including OneNZ, Christchurch City Council, and Mackenzie District Council. I was responsible for all design and frontend architecture, as well as parts of the backend and database services. Last year, the project passed One NZ's security compliance verification.

projects.title: Activity Hub
projects.description: Developed an activity hub where users can register, post, join events, and message each other. Deployed on Google Firebase with a fully integrated front and back end.

projects.title: Magic Memory
projects.description: This is a sample React and Firebase project that includes nearly all essential features, such as TypeScript, React, and deployment on Firebase.

projects.title: Tyre Shop
projects.description: Initially started as a simple frontend software while learning Angular unit testing. Later, I got inspired to develop a full-stack application with a database and optimized UI/UX.

projects.title: Vertu Equipment
projects.description: In 2020, provided a series of services for this company including website design, development, deployment, and database management. The website has undergone multiple iterations since the project ended.

references.name: Steven Dirven
references.content: Simon has been an exemplary full-stack developer at Shape Technology, leading frontend development, DevOps, and CI/CD pipelines. Skilled in TypeScript, Angular, C#, .NET Core, and MySQL, he excels at maintaining code, implementing features, and documenting best practices. A continuous learner and dedicated team player, Simon is a valuable asset to any development team.

references.name: Luke Wang
references.content: Collaborating with Simon has been a pleasure with his excellent communication and attention to detail. Alongside being a wonderful person, Simon consistently delivers front-end features that solve key workflow issues within our team. The usability and quality of his work has only improved during the time we worked together. I am confident that Simon's remarkable work ethic will continue throughout his career.

references.name: Caleb Waddell
references.position: Former Head of Research And Development at Shape Technology Ltd
references.content: Simon Shen, a former Front-End Developer at Shape Technology, showcased exceptional technical skills, creativity, and professionalism. His mastery of modern front-end technologies and proactive problem-solving made him an asset. Highly recommended for any front-end development role.
